name: Canthaxanthin
foods: Used in such products as chicken in breadcrumbs, fish fingers, mallow biscuits, pickles and preserves, sauces and sweets it is also fed to laying hens to make to colour egg yolks.
notice: Found to accumulate on the retina, having a detrimental effect on eyesight.
info: Yellow color, historically it was prepared from shrimp waste or flaming feathers. Synthetic cantaxanthin is cheaper and has higher purity.
